content.question:
Analyze major changes and continuities in the formation of national identities in ONE of the regions listed below from 1914 to the present. Be sure to include evidence from specific countries in the region selected.

Middle East

Southeast Asia

Sub-Saharan Africa

frqParts.text:
Analyze major changes and continuities in the formation of national identities in ONE of the regions listed below from 1914 to the present. Be sure to include evidence from specific countries in the region selected.

Middle East

Southeast Asia

Sub-Saharan Africa

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
